entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
